name: Protolares: The Great Closet Escape
description:
This is the most realistic looking game you'll ever play.  In this visual text-adventure, a seamless world is  brought to life with 600 lines  of C++ spaghetti code, 78 short mp4 videos, and 1 large .json file.  Interact with the environment using the command line and solve tricky puzzles to escape the closet that some guy locked you in, for some reason.

[Note that playing this game requires the VLC media player. Make sure to have VLC downloaded before playing!  Download at https://www.videolan.org/vlc/]

Made by Daniel Fuerlinger

For using JSON in C++ I used  nlohmann::json, available at  https://github.com/nlohmann/json
